AND t.mod_type in ('qy','dy')
AND t.mod_ename LIKE '%'||#{modEname}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{modEname}, '%')

select t.`id` AS id, t.`mod_name` AS modName, dc.label AS modType, t.`mod_ename` AS modEname, t.`mod_pay` AS modPay, t.`mod_fee` AS modFee, t.`mod_day` AS modDay, t.`remark` AS remark FROM train_model t LEFT JOIN sys_dict dc ON dc.`value`= t.mod_type WHERE 1=1 AND dc.type = 'model_type' AND t.mod_type = 'qy' AND t.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.create_date DESC
